definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to tether/to tie up/(fig.) to restrict/to keep a hold on
organ stop (button activating a row of pipes)

sentences.english: Please keep your dog on a leash.
sentences.chinese: 請把你的狗用狗鏈拴好。

sentences.english: What is the use of that wire which he has fastened there?
sentences.chinese: 他拴在那裏的那根鋼絲繩有什麼用處了？

sentences.english: Dora tied her dog to the street railings.
sentences.chinese: 朵拉把她的狗拴在街旁的欄杆上了。

sentences.english: Tie the horse to the tree.
She heard the barking of an old dog that was chained to the sycamore tree.
sentences.chinese: 一條老狗的吠聲傳來，狗拴在那棵懸鈴木上。

sentences.english: The man fastened his horse to a tree and hurried into the inn.
sentences.chinese: 那人把馬拴在樹上，匆匆忙忙走進小酒店。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the therapeutic efficacy of microsurgery on tethered cord syndrome(TCS) in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究顯微手術治療兒童脊髓拴系綜合徵的療效。

sentences.english: The BS expander makes sure that the telescopic sections hold firm at the adjusted length.
sentences.chinese: BS系統的膨脹拴可以確保調整過長度的杖杆的穩固。

sentences.english: I'm seeing boats in the marina being tethered up.
sentences.chinese: 我看到碼頭的船隻已經拴起來。

sentences.english: Soldiers profaned the church when they stabled their horses in it.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們把馬拴在教堂中時，褻瀆了教堂。

sentences.english: He sells soya bean asinine tie on a tree.
sentences.chinese: 他把驢拴在一棵樹上就賣黃豆去了。

sentences.english: The dog is fastened to the post by an iron chain.
sentences.chinese: 那條狗用鐵索拴在柱子上了。

sentences.english: The farmer was yoking his oxen to a plough.
sentences.chinese: 每個農民都知道怎樣把牛拴在一起。

sentences.english: At last he did, he tied the boat to metal ring that was stuck in the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 最後他做到了，他把船拴在了沉在岩石中的鐵柱上。

sentences.english: He chained his bike to the fence.
sentences.chinese: 他用鏈條把自行車拴在柵欄上。

definition: to tether/to tie up/(fig.) to restrict/to keep a hold on
to tie/bind or fasten together/to kidnap
to wind around/to wrap round/to coil/tangle/to involve/to bother/to annoy
